description:
https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/#quota-sets-os-quota-sets

In "List Default Quotas For Tenant" API of Quota sets (os-quota-sets) APIs,
the 'detail' button does not work.
If pushing the 'detail' button, it is not expanded.

And links in left sides, the "List Default Quotas For Tenant" link is broken.
title: api-ref: 'detail' button does not work in os-quota-sets API

comments.content:
https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/#quota-sets-os-quota-sets

In "List Default Quotas For Tenant" API of Quota sets (os-quota-sets) APIs,
the 'detail' button does not work.
If pushing the 'detail' button, it is not expanded.

And links in left sides, the "List Default Quotas For Tenant" link is broken.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~natsume-takashi

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.content:

commit 1a0a04dc05f2599ab007d0599ae42e68f75ba188
Author: Takashi NATSUME <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jul 19 15:58:11 2017 +0900

    api-ref: Fix an expand button in os-quota-sets
    
    If section reference name is changed not to overlap,
    when the 'List Default Quotas For Tenant' API section
    is collapsed, it cannot be followed by users.
    So the reference is changed to the 'os-quota-sets' chapter.
    
    Change-Id: Ic61b38cabde3b3225f778833f0e7aae6acf5eabc
    Closes-Bug: #1705191
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 16.0.0.0b3 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
